page.title: 05Farming in our area
page.content: We visited one of the{farms}in our area;the one nearest to school.Mr. Barlow told us that the farm was about {250 years old.}Their family had only farmed it since 1942,45 years ago.We asked how farming had changed and he said it was easier today but far more dangerous because of the{chemicals}and {farm machinery.}They farmed winter wheat,winter barley,potatoes,grass and a new crop,oil_seed rape.They also had 65 beasts and 150 pigs to fatten for food.It takes three of them,all brothers,to run the farm.Other farms in the area have dairy cattle and one farm,Limphill Farm trains race horses for the national hunt.Summer and Autumn are their busiest times when they work long hours.The animals need attention seven days a week.
